title: Brewster's Millions (1985) (Richard Pryor, John Candy)
description:
BREWSTER'S MILLIONS - 1985

IMDb Rating: 5.9
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0088850/

  This movie stars Richard Pryor and John Candy as a pair of minor-league baseball players whose best days are behind them. Then Pryor is informed that he has just inherited a fortune--$300 million. But it comes with a condition: he must spend $30 million in one month, with a number of rules about how much he can spend at one time and how many of any one thing he can buy, and he can't tell anyone why he must spend it.

  Starring: Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee, Stephen Collins, Jerry Orbach.

  Directed by: Walter Hill.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 41min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 720 x 448
